overview: Kendra finds that Christian has a hard time concentrating on his studies unless sex is involved. Michelle checks up on her son's friend Chris, who is spending the night. She decides to wake him up with a surprise. Feeling lonely after her husband died, Rayveness seeks attention from an old friend. Tanya fucks her boss' son, so that he can put in a good word for her. Dane seeks out a tarot card reader, Zoey shows him his future is full of energy.
title: Cougar's Prey 3
